name: One Piece Burning Blood Marineford Collector's Edition
summary:
Exclusive to the PlayStation®4, One Piece: Burning Blood Marineford Edition celebrates "The Strongest Man in the World" with contents iconic to the dramatic Marineford story arc. 
Includes Base Game 
Official Art Book 
Marineford Display Background 
2 Figures: 
Edward "Whitebeard" Newgate Statue (19.5cm tall) 
Whitebeard's Grave (29.5cm tall) 
Removable jacket can be worn over Whitebeard's shoulders or hung on his grave for a perfect visual recreation from the series. 
Collector's Box
